reporter_caption.center: ANTHONY v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION, 19 WAP 2010 (Pa. 6-20-2011)

caption.center: CHRISTOPHER L. ANTHONY, Appellant v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION AND
PAROLE AND THE DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS, Appellees.

court.center: Supreme Court of Pennsylvania, Western District.

opinion.posture: Appeal from the Order of the Commonwealth Court entered May 13, 2010 at No. 439 M.D. 2010.
opinion.opinion_text: AND NOW, this 20th day of June, 2011, the Order of the Commonwealth Court is hereby AFFIRMED.Page 1
